item.description:
There are SEVERAL Ringling Circus Protests going on during the week that Ringling is showing in Worcester. Please note the event dates and times. You are invited to attend any of these event times and please contact the appropriate contact person for each time. It will be a peaceful protest, with sign-holding in front of the building as circus-goers enter the event.  Its a good way to take a stand against cruelty by simply showing up and having a large group, to show people that we don't accept cruelty in our city.


When: Wednesday, October 3, 11:45 a.m.–1 p.m.
Contact: Adam at AdamM@peta.org or 323-210-2210

When: Wednesday, October 3, 6–7 p.m.
Contact: Mathew Morse at maboi76@aol.com or 612-701-4489

When: Thursday, October 4, 6–7 p.m.
Contact: Karen Pitzi at karen.pitzi@gmail.com or 207-632-0341

When: Friday, October 5, 6–7 p.m.
Contact: Desiree Knurek at desireek000@gmail.com or 413-262-6448

When: Saturday, October 6, 1–3:15 p.m.
Contact: Massachusetts Animal Rights Coalition at info@massanimalrights.org

When: Sunday, October 7, 2–3 p.m.
Contact: Hilary Dupree at hilaryemt@yahoo.com or 774-275-0499

All materials will be provided but if you want to make your own effective posters and bring them, that is great and also effective! . Reserved Parking will not be provided, so make sure to leave enough extra time to park your car and walk to the event as it will be busy in the area during that time.

PLEASE RSVP TO THE FACEBOOK INVITE AS WELL AND INVITE YOUR FRIENDS: http://www.facebook.com/events/282392121874797/

Familiarize yourself with information about circus cruelty in case anyone has any questions.

Information about Circus Cruelty: http://www.ringlingbeatsanimals.com http://www.mercyforanimals.org/circuses.asp http://www.aspca.org/fight-animal-cruelty/circus-cruelty http://www.aspca.org/fight-animal-cruelty/circus-cruelty/animal-free-circuses.aspx http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CyqxpPJ8MP8
http://www.peta.org/issues/animals-in-entertainment/circuses.aspx

For more info on getting involved in Worcester, email info@vegworcester.com
item.how_to_find_us: In front of the DCU Center (email/call organizers for more info)
item.name: Ringling Bros Circus Protests in Worcester 2012
